Classes in org.epochx.stats used by org.epochx.core
StatsManager
          Gathers data and statistics about events that occur during execution of the given Model and makes them available for use.
 

Classes in org.epochx.stats used by org.epochx.ge.stats
StatField
          Provides constants to be used as keys to request statistics from the StatsManager.
StatsEngine
          Generates statistics about evolutionary events.
